name: It wasn't a love song
description:
It wasn't a love song is a experimental puzzle game in which you have tyo use a Korg Nano Control to tweak values in order to discover clues of a crime.

The clues you discover and the order of them change in every game session.

To test it, you will need a Korg Nano Controller to play the game.

Developed using Keijiro's MIDIJack plugin. https://github.com/keijiro/MidiJack

Developed with Unity 2017.
